args.natural_language_statement: Let z ∈ ℂ. Show that |sin z| ≥ |sin (Re z)|. Translate into Lean4: state a theorem which for any complex number z proves that the complex absolute value of Complex.sin z is greater than or equal to the complex absolute value of Complex.sin of the real part of z. End the Lean4 statement with := by sorry and import Mathlib at the top.

result:
{"ok": true, "lean_translation": "import Mathlib
open scoped Real

/-- Let z ∈ ℂ. Show that |sin z| ≥ |sin (Re z)|. Translate into Lean4: state a theorem which for any complex number z proves that the complex absolute value of Complex.sin z is greater than or equal to the complex absolute value of Complex.sin of the real part of z. End the Lean4 statement with := by sorry and import Mathlib at the top. -/
theorem abs_sin_c_le_abs_sin_re (z : ℂ) : ‖Complex.sin z‖ ≤ ‖Complex.sin z.re‖ := sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-!
Let z ∈ ℂ. Show that |sin z| ≥ |sin (Re z)|.
This file states the lemma in Lean4 / Mathlib4. The proof is omitted (":= by sorry").
-/-

theorem abs_sin_complex_ge_abs_sin_re (z : ℂ) :
  Complex.abs (Complex.sin z) ≥ Complex.abs (Complex.sin z.re) := by sorry

  Complex.abs (Complex.sin z) ≥ Complex.abs (Complex.sin z.re) := by sorry
